mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_booking_user (user_no, shop_no, date, time, mem_num) VALUES ( #{userNo}, #{shopNo}, #{bookingDate}, #{bookingTime}, #{bookingMemNum} )
mapper.select: SELECT tbl_booking_user.*, tbl_shop.* FROM tbl_booking_user JOIN tbl_shop ON tbl_booking_user.shop_no = tbl_shop.no WHERE tbl_booking_user.user_no = #{userNo}
